channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The bull market has survived Trump’s tariff onslaught. But stocks aren’t out of the woods just yet.
item.description: For a few tense days last month, it looked like a roaring bull market for U.S. stocks was coming to an end after an impressive 2½ year run.

item.title: If you survived the past few weeks of stock-market turmoil, should you now rethink your portfolio?
item.description: Advisers say now is a good time to gauge your appetite for risk.

item.title: Consumer prices likely rebounded in April as higher tariffs began to bite
item.description: Consumer prices likely rebounded in April as the first bite to Americans’ pocketbooks started to hit, economists say.

item.title: Under new GOP bill, multimillionaires could dodge the 39.6% tax rate floated by Trump
item.description: The multimillionaires who were in President Donald Trump’s sights for a possible tax hike can breathe a little easier. A high-end income-tax rate of 3...

item.title: Before you back up the truck for stocks, know that big rallies happen more in bear markets
item.description: Why you shouldn’t assume the stock market’s surge means the bulls are back.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
